agents.name: Dispute Conversation Agent
agents.description: Conducts structured conversational intake with customers to gather dispute details, transaction information, and supporting context

agents.name: Knowledge Retrieval Agent
agents.description: Searches dispute policies, FAQs, and historical case outcomes from knowledge base to support case analysis

knowledge_base.description: Knowledge base containing dispute policies, FAQs, and historical case outcomes

agents.name: Case Analysis Agent
agents.description: Analyzes dispute details against retrieved policies, calculates resolution confidence, flags cases requiring human review

agents.name: Dispute Analysis Manager
agents.description: Coordinates knowledge retrieval and case analysis, aggregates findings, determines if human escalation is required or auto-resolution is possible
agents.trigger: Submit for Analysis on Customer Portal

agents.name: Transaction Validation Agent
agents.description: Assists merchants in validating disputed transactions, cross-references transaction details, and provides validation recommendations

custom_integration.note: Requires custom API integration for transaction database access

workflow_flow: Customer initiates dispute via 'Start Dispute' → Dispute Conversation Agent
Customer clicks 'Submit for Analysis' → Dispute Analysis Manager
Dispute Analysis Manager coordinates → Knowledge Retrieval Agent + Case Analysis Agent (sub-agents)
Merchant clicks 'Validate Transaction' → Transaction Validation Agent

knowledge_base.purpose: Dispute policies, FAQs, and historical case outcomes
